backend/main.mo: Actor canister providing access control, user profiles, and storage for videos, audio, music, and scene configs with related metadata types.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking product requirements to specific frontend files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries describing responsibilities of major frontend components, hooks, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS variables and theme definitions for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React application and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routes, layout, theming, and React Query provider.
frontend/src/components/AvatarSetup.tsx: Avatar management UI supporting GLB upload, validation, registration, deletion, and user assignment.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with navigation links, branding, and a credits section using navigate buttons.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Provides the main site header with theme toggle, navigation for public and authenticated pages, and user login/logout handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Displays a modal prompting new authenticated users to enter and save their name as part of profile setup.
frontend/src/components/Scene3D.tsx: Creates a dynamic 3D scene using react‑three‑fiber, adding environment elements based on text analysis and supporting avatars, gestures, and emotion cues.
frontend/src/components/ScenePreview.tsx: Manages video generation workflow, playback controls, emotion and gesture processing, and displays a live 3D preview while handling uploaded avatar data.
frontend/src/components/TextInput.tsx: Provides a text input card for scene descriptions with example prompts and validation before triggering video generation.
frontend/src/components/VideoLibrary.tsx: Video library UI that loads, previews, retries, and manages user videos using blobs, MIME detection, and playback state.
frontend/src/components/VirtualActor.tsx: Three.js virtual avatar component that loads a GLTF model, applies emotion blendshapes, and triggers gesture animations over time.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, login flow, and persisted identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for CRUD operations on videos, media assets, avatars, and user profiles using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base and theme variables defining light/dark mode colors, radii, and utility styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts React with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact form with fields for name, email, subject, and message, showing a success toast on submit.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePage.tsx: Provides text input and triggers AI video generation with a preview component showing generation state.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Displays user stats, recent activity, and quick actions, loading user identity, profile, and videos.
frontend/src/pages/EditorPage.tsx: Loads a video by ID and shows a placeholder editor interface, with fallbacks for loading and missing videos.
frontend/src/pages/ExamplesPage.tsx: Lists sample video ideas with categories, durations, and preview cards for inspiration.
frontend/src/pages/FeaturesPage.tsx: Shows a grid of product features with icons and descriptions highlighting capabilities of the platform.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page presenting features, use cases, pricing tiers, and CTAs to create or view example videos.
frontend/src/pages/LibraryPage.tsx: Displays the user's video library with a styled background and the VideoLibrary component.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Shows pricing plans with features, descriptions, and CTAs for selecting a subscription tier.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPage.tsx: Renders the Privacy Policy with sections on data collection, usage, rights, and contact info.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: User settings page for managing profile info, notifications, and avatar setup with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Displays Terms of Service outlining usage rules, content rights, acceptable use, and legal disclaimers.
frontend/src/pages/VideoGenerator.tsx: Main video creation interface with text input, avatar tools, video preview, and a tabbed layout for creation and library access.
frontend/src/utils/emotionTimeline.ts: Creates emotion and gesture timelines from EmotionAnalysis, ensuring baseline, midpoint, and end cues plus energy-based gesture selection.
frontend/src/utils/sceneEmotionClassifie: Implements a deterministic keyword‑based classifier that outputs emotion, intensity, energy, and mood from scene text.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, shadows, animations, and container settings with custom theme variables.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing architecture, features, requirements, and known issues for the GrokVid.ai SaaS system.
